sourcesContent:
import {config as dotenv} from 'dotenv'
dotenv()

export const config={
    host:process.env.MYSQL_HOST, 
    user:process.env.MYSQL_USER,
    password:process.env.MYSQL_PASSWORD,
    database:process.env.MYSQL_DATABASE
}

import { Router } from "express";
import { createReports, deleteReport, getReport, getReports, getReportsCount, updateReport } from "../controllers/reports";

const router = Router()
/**
 * @swagger
 * tags:
 * name: Routes
 * description: routes endpoint
 */
/**
 * @swagger
 * /tasks:
 * get:
 * summary: Get all reports
 * tags:[Routes]
 */
router.get('/reports',getReports)
/**
 * @swagger
 * /tasks/count:
 * get:
 * summary: Get all reports counter
 * tags:[Routes]
 */
router.get('/reports/count',getReportsCount)
/**
 * @swagger
 * /tasks:
 * get:
 * summary: Get a report by id
 * tags:[Routes]
 */

router.get('/reports/:id',getReport)
/**
 * @swagger
 * /tasks:
 * post:
 * summary: save a new report
 * tags:[Routes]
 */

router.post('/reports',createReports)
/**
 * @swagger
 * /tasks:
 * delete:
 * summary: Delete report id
 * tags:[Routes]
 */

router.delete('/reports/:id',deleteReport)
/**
 * @swagger
 * /tasks:
 * put:
 * summary: Update report by id
 * tags:[Routes]
 */

router.put('/reports/:id',updateReport)

export default router()

import {config as dotenv} from 'dotenv'
dotenv()

export const config={
    host:process.env.MYSQL_HOST, 
    user:process.env.MYSQL_USER,
    password:process.env.MYSQL_PASSWORD,
    database:process.env.MYSQL_DATABASE
}

import { Router } from "express";
import { deleteReport, getReport, getReports, getReportsCount, saveReport, updateReport } from "../controllers/reports";

const routers = Router();

/**
 * @swagger
 * tags:
 * name: Routes
 * description: routes endpoint
 */

/**
 * @swagger
 * /tasks:
 * get:
 * summary: Get all reports
 * tags: [Routes]
 */
routers.get('/reports', getReports);

/**
 * @swagger
 * /tasks/count:
 * get:
 * summary: Get all reports counter
 * tags: [Routes]
 */
routers.get('/reports/count', getReportsCount);

/**
 * @swagger
 * /tasks:
 * get:
 * summary: Get a report by id
 * tags: [Routes]
 */
routers.get('/reports/:id', getReport);

/**
 * @swagger
 * /tasks:
 * post:
 * summary: save a new report
 * tags: [Routes]
 */
routers.post('/reports', saveReport);

/**
 * @swagger
 * /tasks:
 * delete:
 * summary: Delete report id
 * tags: [Routes]
 */
routers.delete('/reports/:id', deleteReport);

/**
 * @swagger
 * /tasks:
 * put:
 * summary: Update report by id
 * tags: [Routes]
 */
routers.put('/reports/:id', updateReport);

export default routers;

dotenv()

    database:process.env.MYSQL_DATABASE
}

import { Router } from "express";

/**

/**

/**

routers.get('/reports/:id', getReport);

/**

routers.post('/reports', saveReport);

/**

routers.delete('/reports/:id', deleteReport);

/**

routers.put('/reports/:id', updateReport);

export default routers;
